description: Residents of Pinole, in the San Francisco Bay Area, are up in arms after a video went viral showing a woman using racist slurs, which has also caught the attention of police and city leaders.
title: Bay Area community incensed over viral video of woman repeating racist slurs

description: For many Black-owned beauty supply stores, Trump's trade war is hitting close to home.
title: Coming to a beauty supply store near you: Trump's trade war

description: Future Hall of Fame quarterback Aaron Rodgers said he remains undecided on his future in the NFL, including the possibility of retirement.
title: Aaron Rodgers remains undecided on NFL future: 'I'm open to anything'

description: Endangered sea turtles show signs of recovery in a majority of places where they’re found worldwide, according to a new global survey released Thursday.
title: Endangered sea turtles show signs of recovery in more than half the world, survey finds

description: A Colorado man is facing a federal charge after allegedly sending emails titled "Declaration of War," threatening Tesla owners, President Donald Trump's cabinet and Elon Musk, the U.S.
title: Colorado man charged with alleged threats against Tesla owners and presidential cabinet

description: Police have confirmed to NBC News that at least one person was killed in a shooting at Florida State University that wounded several others and that one person is in custody.
title: At least one person killed in FSU shooting

description: Donald Trump, the candidate, pledged to get “transgender insanity the hell out of our schools” and “keep men out of women’s sports.”
title: Trump kept his promise to order a ban on trans female athletes. Court fights have followed.

description: The Supreme Court said it will hear oral arguments next month on whether the Trump administration can take steps to enforce its contentious proposal to end automatic birthright citizenship while litigation continues.
title: Supreme Court to hear arguments on whether Trump can implement birthright citizenship plan

description: Wesley Stanovsek was a dream hire for the IRS in 2024.
title: Tax attorneys say IRS has become a 'zombie' as agency cuts staff and halts audits of the wealthy

description: American Express’ affluent cardmembers are showing few signs of curbing their spending, and younger customers drove growth in first-quarter transaction volumes, Chief Financial Officer Christophe Le Caillec told CNBC.
title: American Express' wealthy cardholders are mostly untouched by tariff jitters

description: The Trump administration is continuing its battle against Harvard University — this time, canceling $2.7 million in grants and threatening to stop the enrollment of international students.
title: Trump admin threatens to stop Harvard from enrolling foreign students

description: New Jersey has sued the social gaming platform Discord for allegedly failing to adequately protect underage users from predators, the first state to do so.
title: N.J. attorney general sues Discord messaging app over child predator concerns

description: Crafton Hills College is about to see its youngest scholar walk the graduation stage.
title: 10-year-old girl set to be Crafton Hills College's youngest grad

description: Florida State University student Daniella Streety tells NBC News' Tom Llamas she saw apparent victims being evacuated and a heavy police presence after reports of an active shooting near the student union.
title: 'Nothing but blue lights': FSU student describes aftermath of campus shooting

description: Some workers at the National Oceanic and Atmospheric Administration who were fired in February, rehired in March and then fired for a second time in April, say the agency has missed some salary payments during that period, and failed to have their health insurance plans restored or provide basic paperwork.
title: NOAA workers report 'intentional chaos' during personnel cuts

description: Cell phone video shows people running on a street near Florida State University where an active shooter has been reported.
title: Video shows people running on street near FSU campus

description: Watch live coverage after an active shooter was reported at Florida State University.
title: Active shooter reported at Florida State University

description: The university sent out an alert urging students to seek shelter as a shooter was reported in the area of the student union.
title: Active shooter reported at Florida State University

description: Lee Corso’s nearly four-decade run on ESPN’s “College GameDay” is coming to an end.
title: Lee Corso to retire from ESPN's 'College GameDay' after 38 seasons

description: Five million people are at risk of storms Thursday across eastern Nebraska, northern Missouri, most of Iowa and southern Minnesota, with hazards including very large hail up to 2 inches in diameter, damaging winds and possible tornadoes.
title: Severe storms threaten large parts of U.S. over Easter weekend

description: Nissan Motor’s new Americas leader said the automaker is aiming to “max out” production at its largest American production plant amid President Donald Trump’s 25% auto tariffs.
title: Nissan aims to 'max out' U.S. production plant amid Trump's tariffs

description: Target CEO Brian Cornell will meet with the Rev.
title: Target CEO Cornell to meet with Sharpton to discuss DEI rollback as civil rights leader considers boycott

description: Family and friends of a Venezuelan migrant living in Texas say officials sent him to an El Salvador mega jail because he had an autism awareness tattoo.
title: Asylum seeker sent to El Salvador mega jail for autism awareness tattoo, family says

description: French luxury group Hermès will raise its U.S. prices from the start of May in order to offset the impact of President Donald Trump’s tariffs, the company’s finance chief said Thursday.
title: Hermès to hike U.S. prices for iconic bags and scarves in response to Trump tariffs

description: A bright object falling from space lit up the skies over Mexico’s capital around 3 a.m. Wednesday, stretching over plains, volcanoes and small towns.
title: A 'fireball' lights up Mexico City skies, sparking awe and plenty of memes

description: RFK Jr.'s Health Department shut down an advisory group that recommends how to test newborns for genetic disorders
title: HHS eliminates advisory committee on newborn screening ahead of vote on rare disorders

description: Kane Bolan never went anywhere without his magical fishhook from Disney's "Moana," except for school.
title: Surprise call from 'The Rock' brings 6-year-old boy joy in his final days

description: Alphabet’s Google illegally dominated two markets for online advertising technology, a federal judge said on Thursday, dealing another blow to the tech titan.
title: U.S. judge finds Google holds illegal online ad tech monopolies

description: Fans of YouTuber MrBeast who signed up for an "unforgettable" Las Vegas experience got what they asked for ... just not in the way they expected.
title: MrBeast fans outraged over three-day Las Vegas 'immersive' event

description: A doctor born in the United States says she received an email from federal immigration authorities demanding that she leave the country immediately.
title: American doctor receives email from immigration officials telling her to leave the country immediately

description: Veteran umpire Hunter Wendelstedt went to a hospital for further examination on Wednesday after he was struck in the face behind first base by a line drive foul ball in Minnesota.
title: MLB umpire goes to the hospital after being hit by foul ball

description: USA Football has officially been certified as the national governing body for American football by the U.S.
title: USA Football to lead Olympic efforts ahead of Los Angeles Games in 2028

description: With the help of the James Webb Telescope, scientists say they have detected two gases, that are generated on Earth by living organisms, in a distant planet’s atmosphere — suggesting it may be teeming with microbial life.
title: Scientists say they found a planet that may be teeming with life

description: Crews are working to restore power on Puerto Rico after another island-wide blackout. The outage began Wednesday and left 1.4 million people without power and 300,000 without water. It’s the second massive outage in less than four months.
title: Puerto Rico hit with another blackout, leaving 1.4M without power

description: President Donald Trump's meeting with Italian Prime Minister Giorgia Meloni is expected to focus in part on tariffs and trade.
title: Trump blasts Fed Chair for saying tariffs were 'significantly larger' than expected

description: After Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell acknowledged on Wednesday that there might be an economic downturn due to Trump’s tariffs, the president posted on social media suggesting the chair should be fired — but does he have the authority to do that? NBC’s Brian Cheung joins TODAY with analysis.
title: Trump says Jerome Powell’s termination ‘cannot come fast enough’

description: The family of Victor Perez, the 17-year-old Idaho autistic boy with cerebral palsy who died after he was shot by police outside his home earlier this month, notified the city of Pocatello of its intention to file a federal wrongful death lawsuit for "negligent" conduct and for using excessive force.
title: Family of Victor Perez, disabled 17-year-old shot dead by police, intend to sue city of Pocatello for wrongful death

description: New documents from the Trump administration seek to bolster its assertion that Kilmar Abrego Garcia is a member of MS-13.
title: New documents in Kilmar Abrego Garcia case and Trump's Golden Dome ambitions: Morning Rundown

description: Olympians competing in the NCAA championships include 2024 gold medalists Jordan Chiles (UCLA) and Jade Carey (Oregon State).
title: Jordan Chiles, Jade Carey highlight Olympic stars to watch in gymnastics national championships

description: A daily pill from Eli Lilly lowered blood sugar levels and induced weight loss in people with Type 2 diabetes, the company announced Thursday.
title: Lilly says daily pill can lower blood sugar and weight in people with Type 2 diabetes

description: A foodborne illness linked to lettuce ripped across 15 states last November, sickening dozens of people and killing one. But the federal government chose not to publicize it.
title: A deadly E. coli outbreak hit 15 states, but the FDA chose not to publicize it

description: Canada’s national ban on American-made wine and the Trump administration’s global tariffs have compounded the struggles of the United States’ already-stressed wine industry.
title: America’s struggling wine industry is getting crushed by global tariffs and Canada’s retaliation to them

description: Pentagon officials will soon brief Trump on options for him to fulfill his pledge to protect the U.S. with something modeled on Israel’s Iron Dome defense
title: The Pentagon is working to make Trump’s vision of a U.S. ‘Iron Dome’ a reality

description: A former New York police sergeant was sentenced Wednesday to 18 months in prison in a U.S. case about China’s pursuit of critics abroad, a sentence that came after two members of Congress urged the judge to spare him from time behind bars.
title: Ex-NYPD officer sentenced to 18 months after conviction for helping China stalk an expat

description: Three people died in a boat crash on an Alabama lake during a fishing tournament Wednesday morning, officials said.
title: 3 dead in boat crash at Alabama fishing tournament

description: The Trump administration released a series of documents after weeks of pressure to prove its contention that Kilmar Abrego Garcia was a member of the MS-13 gang.
title: New documents detail government's case that mistakenly deported man was a gang member

description: A Florida teacher and an elementary school principal were charged late last month in connection with a house party where minors were drinking, including one who was so drunk they needed treatment, officials said.
title: Florida principal and teacher charged after 100 minors were at house party with alcohol

description: Puerto Rico experienced another power outage as residents prepared to celebrate Easter weekend, the latest in a string of major blackouts since the New Year's Eve dayslong blackout.
title: Massive power outage hits Puerto Rico

description: Erik and Lyle Menendez are expected to appear virtually in a Los Angeles courtroom beginning Thursday for two-day hearing that will examine whether they should be freed.
title: What to know as a judge considers the Menendez brothers’ life sentences for their parents’ murders

description: Days after an arson attack on Pennsylvania Gov. Josh Shapiro’s residence, Trump still has not called Shapiro or weighed in significantly to condemn the violence.
title: Pennsylvania Gov. Josh Shapiro says he hasn't heard from Trump since the arson attack

description: The Trump administration plans to eliminate the IRS’ Direct File program, an electronic system for filing tax returns directly to the agency for free, according to two people familiar with the decision.
title: Trump administration plans to end the IRS Direct File program for free tax filing, sources say

description: The rescue made him a hero — and earned Buford, a 6-year-old Anatolian Pyrenees, a hero’s dinner.
title: Dozens searched for a missing 2-year-old in the Arizona desert. Buford the dog was the real hero.
